column1: We are living in times of great need. #COVID19 has caused many in our community to face food insecurity. We must provide support to those in our community now more than ever. This past Thursday during our Thanksgiving Super Fest we were able to provide 25000 families meals. https://t.co/ildPNiLog2
No-cost #COVID19 testing today. https://t.co/QyuyqQcb1J

Thank you to the Biden and Harris Team for their Coronavirus Task Force. After whatever legal options the President utilizes it is urgent that the government be allowed to move forward because lives have to be saved and our country has to survive. 2/2

Today America experienced 61964 hospitalizations 135000 infections and more than 1300 deaths due to COVID-19.  President Trump continues to angle for power that he has lost and Americans are still suffering. We must contain COVID-19. 1/2
